scripts.deploy: yarn lint && AWS_PROFILE=lldev && npx sls deploy -s dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn lint && export AWS_PROFILE=llprod && npx sls deploy -s prod --verbose
scripts.start: export AWS_PROFILE=llprod && serverless offline start -s prod
scripts.start:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=lldev && serverless offline start -s dev
